00058     
00059     class UdpSenderInterests : public PosixQueues::MyInterests<RDK2::Object> {
00060     public:
00061         bool areYouInterested(const RDK2::Object* object) {
00062             const RNetObjects::RNetMessage* message;
00063             if ((message = dynamic_cast<const RNetObjects::RNetMessage*>(object)) &&
00064             (Network::UDP_IP == message->getNetProtocol()))
00065                 return true;
00066             else
00067                 return false;
00068         }
00069     };
00070 };
